channel.title: gen-AI on Hi, I'm Xuan
channel.description: Recent content in gen-AI on Hi, I'm Xuan

item.title: Creating Sun-Tzu AI
item.description: As a Product Marketer who has been interested in AI and the latest evolutions of GenAI, I wasn’t sure how to be a creator rather than a consumer of AI. Sure, I talked to ChatGPT from time to time, used midjourney to generate images for my blog, but I’ve never really ‘built’ anything. I was watching a Stanford CS50 talk on GPT-4 where Ted Benson (founder of Steamship) described how easy it is to create a simple application using GPT technology, provided you know a bit of Python.
